blogName: The Ultimate Habit Tracker Guide: Why and How to Track Your Habits
description: If you want to stick with a habit for good, one simple and effective thing you can do is keep a habit tracker. Here's why: Elite performers will often measure, quantify, and track their progress in various ways. Each little measurement provides feedback. It offers a signal of whether they are making progress or need to change course.

blogName: Build or Break Habits Using Science-Based Tools
description: This month, I want to provide you with actionable information in a condensed form about habits: how to form habits and how to break them...During the episode, I describe two program frameworks for habits that are aligned with our biology and neurochemistry, which makes forming great habits and breaking bad habits much easier. They work best when combined.
